original: @129a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @129a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: aom na ma: sha pa ra na ma sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom na ma: sha pa ra na ma sv'ah'a /

original: so rtsi la sngags 'dis btab ste khar bcug @129b na gang la bltas pa de dag dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so rtsi la sngags 'dis btab ste khar bcug @129b na gang la bltas pa de dag dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having enchanted the tooth stick with this mantra, if one chews it and looks at someone, they will become pleased.

original: mi / dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: mi / dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī for pleasing people is complete.
